dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SJ 9 IS: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission relating to “Commission Guidance Regarding the Listing of Voluntary Carbon Credit Derivative Contracts”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Kennedy (for himself and Mr. Sheehy) introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission relating to Commission Guidance Regarding the Listing of Voluntary Carbon Credit Derivative Contracts.

section.text: That Congress disapproves the final guidance submitted by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission relating to Commission Guidance Regarding the Listing of Voluntary Carbon Credit Derivative Contracts (89 Fed. Reg. 83378 (October 15, 2024)) and such rule shall have no force or effect.
